!! BULLET TIME !! Slomo shooter!
Build your OWN weapons, choose your own BULLETS!

Super Block Hot Sniper - Best Pocket FPS Build Lava Sky Lab Pro Edition is a block shooter where you take control of the time. Unless you move the action takes place in super slow motion. You can actually watch projectiles in air but once you start walking time goes by faster. With these capabilities you can avoid bullets shooting at you.

- Build your own weapons!
- Massive Boss fight!
- Immersive gameplay
- Very unique weapon system, variable bullets with own characteristics !!!!
